page.title: 17CHARLOTTE SCOTT AND HER DAY
page.content: {Charlotte is seven years old and lives {at Mount PLeasant Farm which is down {the road from Mr Clark at Lowlands {Farm (see page 2).After getting up at {7 'Lottie' goes down to have breakfast {at 7.30.This consists of 2 Weetabix, {toast and orange juice. After playing {with her dolls she prepares herself {for school. { At 8.45 she is collected by a school {minibus and taken the 2 miles to {Cundall Manor Preparatory School.In {morning, lunch and afternoon breaks {Lottie plays 'horses' or 'dogs' with {her friends.As well as lessons she has {games every afternoon.At 4.50 the {minibus returns her home. { At 5 she has tea.It might be baked {beans and sausages followed by {sandwiches.At 7 she gets ready for bed {and then watches television.At 8 she {goes to bed to read,then sleeps at 9.
